display_long_description:
VRFS is a community-driven soccer (football) simulator focused on realistic physics and competitive multiplayer.

**REALISTIC PHYSICS:** Perform any trick—from balancing the ball on the tip of the foot to executing precise curved power shots and long passes. The ball’s trajectory is fully physics-based.

[media]

**COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER:** Enjoy instant ball-touch response. Finish powerful crosses at speeds identical to real-life soccer.

[media]

**VARIOUS MECHANICS & MODES:** Move with thumbsticks or explore locomotion. Play seated or standing. Free ride casually or join competitive matches.

[media]

**NO PAY-TO-WIN:** Only skills matter in VRFS. No one can buy “stronger kicks” or “faster boots.” Practice leads to improvement.

[media]

**FREE FOR EVERYONE:** Full access without mandatory purchases. Optional gear is available to support further game development.

[media]

**MANY MORE:** Explore hundreds of thousands of community-created arenas and mods. Hang-out with friends, join clubs, and create engaging clips!
